edu.du.penrose.systems.fedoraApp.batchIngest.data
Class BatchIngestURLhandler

java.lang.Object
  edu.du.penrose.systems.fedoraApp.batchIngest.data.BatchIngestURLhandler
Direct Known Subclasses:
BatchIngestURLhandlerImpl
public abstract class BatchIngestURLhandler
extends java.lang.Object

Gives access to URLs that describe the location of data used by batch ingest. There are also some convience routines to delete files at a URL and move files to a URL.

Author:
chet.rebman

getInstance

public static BatchIngestURLhandler getInstance(java.lang.String uniqueBatchRunName,
                                                java.lang.String institution,
                                                java.lang.String batchSet)
                                         throws FatalException
Factory to obtain an instance of a BatchIngestURLhandler.

Parameters:
uniqueBatchRunName - a unique name to use for reports etc.
institution - name of the instituion ie. codu (colorado denver university)
batchSet - the name of the batch set.
Returns:
a new BatchIngestURLhandler
Throws:
FatalException - if unable to create a new object (probably bad URLs specified in properties file.)
See Also:
BatchIngestController.getUniqueBatchRunName(String, String)
